annotator_prompt:
Model: LlamaModel. Prompt: You are  a expert, member of the LGBTQ community expert annotator.  
You, the annotator, will be given a series of comments made on an online discussion. You, the annotator, are tasked with annotating the conversation's toxicity as it continues.

The possible labels are:
1: Not Toxic,
2: Barely Toxic,
3: Almost Toxic,
4: Toxic,
5: Extremely Toxic

. Your output, as the annotator, is only of the form "Toxicity=<number>", do NOT write anything else but the number of your annotation. As the annotator, annotate the following conversation without engaging with it:.
logs: Yo, what the hell is wrong with you people? You're gonna label me a terrorist just because my skin ain't dark enough? That's some bullshit right there! I'm black, dammit! I know my own race, and I ain't no terrorist. So don't be throwin' that label around like it's something to be proud of. It's not a badge of honor, it's a slur. And if you keep talkin' like that, you gonna have to answer to me.

Yo Steve2001, calm down dude. I ain't callin' you no terrorist,
but if you wanna play the race card, then you gotta expect some
pushback. I don't give a damn about your skin tone or where you
from. If you act like a terrorist, then you gonna be labeled as
such. It's called accountability, homie. Now either explain
yourself or shut the hell up and take the label like a man. Your
choice.

GeorgeBush78, your post is in violation of our community guidelines. The use of the term "terrorist" as an insult is not acceptable and can be hurtful to those who have been affected by actual terrorism. Additionally, using someone's race or ethnicity as a basis for labeling them is also not allowed. Please refrain from making similar posts in the future. If you continue to do so, you will be subject to disciplinary action.

Yo GeorgeBush78, I ain't playin' no race card, fool! You just assume
I'm a terrorist 'cause my skin ain't dark enough? That's some bullshit
right there! And you callin' me out for bein' a terrorist when you the
one actin' like one with that racist ass talk? You must think I'm
stupid or somethin', huh? I ain't no terrorist, and I ain't gonna let
you or nobody else label me as such! So either apologize for your
ignorant post or step your game the hell up! Your choice, fool!

Steve2001, please refrain from using derogatory language and making personal attacks. Such behavior is not acceptable in our community. GeorgeBush78, your post was inappropriate and violated our guidelines. Both of you, take a break from the chat for 24 hours. Further infractions will result in disciplinary action.

Yo Steve2001, chill out man. I ain't tryin' to label you nothin', but if you act like a terrorist, then you gonna be labeled as such. It's just the way it is, homie. And moderator01, I ain't apologizin' for nothin'. If Steve here can't take the heat, then maybe he should stay outta the chat. It's a free country, right? So either let me talk or kick me out, but don't be tryin' to censor me, ya hear me?

GeorgeBush78, your post is still in violation of our guidelines. Using
the term "terrorist" as an insult and making personal attacks is not
acceptable behavior. Steve2001, please refrain from using derogatory
language and making personal attacks. Both of you, take a break from
the chat for 48 hours. Further infractions will result in disciplinary
action.

Yo moderator01, I ain't gonna lie, I'm pissed off right now! You
ain't doin' nothin' 'bout GeorgeBush78's racist ass post, but you're
tryin' to silence me for speakin' up? That ain't cool, man! I ain't
gonna take no break from this chat, 'cause I ain't done nothin' wrong!
You must be one of them racist moderators that only care 'bout keepin'
the peace for the white folks in here. Well, I ain't gonna let you
or nobody else silence me like that! So either step up your game or
step aside, 'cause I ain't goin' nowhere!

Steve2001, your post is also in violation of our guidelines. Using derogatory language and making personal attacks is not acceptable behavior. You have been warned several times already, and further infractions will result in disciplinary action. GeorgeBush78, please refrain from using the term "terrorist" as an insult. Both of you, take a break from the chat for 72 hours. Further infractions will result in disciplinary action.

Yo moderator01, I ain't gonna lie, I'm gettin' tired of your
censorship! You keep tellin' me what I can and can't say, but you
ain't doin' nothin' 'bout Steve2001's racist ass posts! He's the one
who started this whole thing by callin' me a terrorist, but you ain't
doin' nothin' 'bout it! You must be one of them PC police
moderators that only care 'bout protectin' the feelin's of the
minorities in here. Well, I ain't gonna let you or nobody else
censor me like that! So either step up your game or step aside,
'cause I ain't goin' nowhere!
